data.name: Education, Level Unspecified
data.description: The codes in this category are to be used only when level of education is unspecified or unknown (e.g. training of primary school teachers should be coded under 11220).

data.name: Government & Civil Society-general
data.description: N.B. Use code 51010 for general budget support.

data.name: Conflict, Peace & Security
data.description: N.B. Further notes on ODA eligibility (and exclusions) of conflict, peace and security related activities are given in paragraphs 76-81 of the Directives.

data.name: Transport & Storage
data.description: Note: Manufacturing of transport equipment should be included under code 32172.

data.name: ENERGY GENERATION AND SUPPLY
data.description: Energy sector policy, planning and programmes; aid to energy ministries; institution capacity building and advice; unspecified energy activities including energy conservation.

data.name: General Environment Protection
data.description: Covers activities concerned with conservation, protection or amelioration of the physical environment without sector allocation.

data.name: General Budget Support
data.description: Budget support in the form of sector-wide approaches (SWAps) should be included in the respective sectors.

data.name: Other Commodity Assistance
data.description: Non-food commodity assistance (when benefiting sector not specified).

data.name: Emergency Response
data.description: An emergency is a situation which results from man made crises and/or natural disasters.

data.name: Reconstruction Relief & Rehabilitation
data.description: This relates to activities during and in the aftermath of an emergency situation. Longer-term activities to improve the level of infrastructure or social services should be reported under the relevant economic and social sector codes. See also guideline on distinguishing humanitarian from sector-allocable aid.

data.name: Disaster Prevention & Preparedness
data.description: See code 43060 for disaster risk reduction.

data.name: Unallocated / Unspecified
data.description: Contributions to general development of the recipient should be included under programme assistance (51010).
